abilities.name: Storm of Bolts
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one unit (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this model is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Offerings for the Dark Gods
abilities.rule: While a friendly **WAR DOG** model is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by that **WAR DOG** model have the **[SUSTAINED HITS 1]** ability.
